name: Brave the Bugs
description:
Use "Arrow" keys to move, Use "Space" to jump, and the "Arrow keys and Enter" to navigate the user interface. Use "Q" to pause and "M" to mute audio.

Game developers are constantly "lied" to by their code - They think it mean one thing but it is actually another.  This game on the outside seems like a normal platformer but but as you play you will notice you are being lied to by the bugs. 

-- Don't skip the text scenes -  They will help you

-- Created for the Community Game Jam

-- Theme - The game is a liar
